dict.string:
on is_running(appName) tell application "System Events" to (name of processes) contains appName end is_running
set iterm_is_running to is_running("iTerm")
if not iterm_is_running then tell application "iTerm" to activate else tell application "System Events" set theName to name of the first process whose frontmost is true end tell if theName is "iTerm" then tell application "System Events" to set visible of process "iTerm" to false else tell application "iTerm" to activate end if end if
